item.title: Party Animals Codes (June 2025)
item.description:
Quick Links

  • All Party Animals Codes
  • How to Redeem Codes in Party Animals
  • How to Get More Party Animals Codes

Party Animals is a video game that is perfect for having fun with friends. Its gameplay and physics are reminiscent of Gang Beasts, where all the characters are clumsy and move very funny. Party Animals has many modes that you can play with random players with a voice chat or invite your friends to the lobby even if they haven't bought the game.

Also, the game has a large selection of cool skins of cute animals that you can buy for in-game currency or get in the battle pass. Fortunately, you can also get free skins if you redeem Party Animals codes.

Updated June 10, 2025, by Artur Novichenko: Party Animals currently offers a few cosmetic rewards that let you deck out your character with fresh new looks. Whether you're into cats or dogs, there's something stylish to pick, and they're all easy to claim. These items are a fun way to upgrade your in game style. Check back soon - more skins could be added in future updates.

All Party Animals Codes

Working Party Animals Codes

  • LIRIK - Enter this code to get Nayna, Nomu, and Lirik cat skins.
  • beardbox - Enter this code to get Kiko cat skin.
  • joshandkato - Enter this code to get Kato dog skin.
  • S7 - Enter this code to get Smil7y dog skin.

Expired Party Animals Codes

  • HAPPYHAPPYNEMO2024
  • LUCKINCOFFEE

How to Redeem Codes in Party Animals

In Roblox and mobile games, it is often possible to redeem codes, so players usually know how to do it. However, this feature is rare in PC and console games, so gamers may not know how to get rewards. In Party Animals , redeeming codes can be done in just a few clicks, but you may still need help navigating the interface. Therefore, we have created a guide explaining how to redeem codes in Party Animals .

  • Launch Party Animals .
  • Pay attention to the lower-left corner of the screen. Click the button with the dog in the stall to go to the Item Shop.
  • Find the Redeem button at the top.
  • In the white box, paste the code from the list of working codes and click Redeem.

If you play Party Animals through Friend Pass, many features are blocked for you, including code redemption. Therefore, if you want to get rewards, you will have to buy the full version of the game to get rewards.

How to Get More Party Animals Codes

Codes for games can bring you a lot of cool rewards, but they are hard to find. While there are many sources of information for Roblox and mobile games, for games like Party Animals , finding working codes is a real challenge. Therefore, to help you, we create and update guides with codes so that you can always get rewards. Bookmark this site in your browser with Ctrl + D so you don't lose it. Alternatively, you can visit the Party Animals developers' social media for more information.

  • Party Animals X page
  • Party Animals YouTube channel

item.title: Roblox: PRESSURE Codes (June 2025)
item.description:
Quick Links

  • All Pressure Codes
  • How to Redeem Codes for Pressure
  • How to Get More Pressure Codes

Pressure is a unique and well-made survival horror game with great graphics, unusual mechanics, and a concept that you won't find in other Roblox games. You play the role of an Urbanshade prisoner and have to cross the Hadal Blacksite, which is quite a challenge, considering how many monsters and other dangers await you along the way.

By redeeming Pressure codes, you'll receive useful rewards from the developers that will help you to survive this nightmare a little longer. Each code offers generous rewards, such as currencies or resources that will definitely come in handy to those playing this popular Roblox game.

Updated June 10, 2025, by Artur Novichenko: Pressure features an interesting mix of rewards with its current codes. You can gain a Revive Token, but there’s also a twist - you might accidentally lose one or even some in-game money. It’s a quirky system that keeps things unpredictable, so be mindful when claiming. Check back occasionally, as future updates may offer more straightforward bonuses.

All Pressure Codes

Working Pressure Codes

  • ILookedUpTheGamesSocialMediasToGiveMyselfAnAdvantageInTheHuntMEGAEditionByUsingThisCodeToGetAFreeRevive - Redeem the code to get a Revive Token. (NEW)
  • ButTheDevWasMeanAndIncludedAnotherCodeThatWouldRemoveMyReviveAndIWasStupidEnoughToUseIt - Redeem the code to lose a Revive Token. (NEW)
  • Gullible - Redeem code to lose 300 Kroner.

Expired Pressure Codes

  • 2YearsWasted - Redeem the code to get Kroner.
  • Decay - Redeem the code to get Kroner.
  • Christmas!!! - Redeem the code to get Kroner.
  • 200M - Redeem the code to get Kroner.
  • Raveyard - Redeem the code to get rewards.
  • ApologyTour - Redeem the code to get Kroner.
  • WasteOfTime - Redeem the code to get 2 Revives.
  • SMILEYBOMB!!! - Redeem code to get 500 Kroner.
  • slederman - Redeem code to get 2 Revives.

How to Redeem Codes for Pressure

Although Pressure is truly a unique game, the redemption system it uses is much the same as the ones found in other Roblox games, so experienced players should have no problem getting rewards. However, if you're a beginner or have never redeemed a code before, the following step-by-step instructions should help:

  • Launch Pressure .
  • Pay attention to the left side of the screen. There will be three buttons arranged in a column. Interact with the third one with the icon of an adjustable wrench and a gear .
  • This will open the settings menu. At the top of the menu, you will find the Codes option, next to which you will see an input field and a gray Submit button .
  • Finally, type or paste one of the working Pressure codes from the list above into the input field and press the Submit button to claim your reward.

How to Get More Pressure Codes

To find more Roblox promo codes, all you need to do is visit the game's official social media. Here, along with other content, developers often share codes, so be careful not to miss them:

  • Official Pressure Roblox group.
  • Official Pressure Discord server.
  • Official Pressure X account.
Roblox - Game

item.title: GTA 6: Jason's Backstory is a Great Excuse to Feature One Mechanic
item.description:
While the long wait for Grand Theft Auto 6 has only extended thanks to the recently announced delay for the title, the hype surrounding the kind of experiences that the project will eventually bring is showing no signs of fading any time soon. After so much mystery and debate surrounding the game, fans now have two comprehensive trailers that detail the lives and personalities of its two main characters, with Jason and Lucia already shaping up to be fascinating protagonists with a unique bond.

A lot of recent attention has understandably been placed on Grand Theft Auto 6 's Jason thanks to his prominent role in the title's second trailer, with the trailer supposedly being composed of equal parts cinematic sequences and raw gameplay. From what is known of Jason from the trailer as well as the character profiles that Rockstar released in tandem with it, it seems clear that Jason will be acting as a debt collector and enforcer throughout some of the game's story, with this being the perfect opportunity for Rockstar to reintroduce a similar kind of territory control mechanic that GTA has featured in the past.

Jason's Story Could Provide Untold Gameplay Benefits Through a Territory Control Mechanic

While Lucia and Jason may find themselves entangled in a Bonnie-and-Clyde-style relationship throughout the events of Grand Theft Auto 6 's story, the online character profiles that Rockstar released on the game's official website paint more of a picture of their earlier lives. While Lucia owes her upbringing to the mean streets of Liberty City, Jason's earlier life was defined by a brief stint in the army, with many signs pointing towards his experience in a specialized combat role.

Rumors around a remaster or updated port of Grand Theft Auto 4 have recently picked up a lot of steam, with some fans hoping that this kind of project might give players their first glimpses or references of Lucia due to the game's Liberty City setting.

The character profile for Jason paints a clearer picture of his connections to Brian Heder, another major character in GTA 6 , who acts as Jason's mentor and unofficial employer. In exchange for payment and rent-free living, Jason is shown in the second trailer for GTA 6 shaking down businesses to collect money that is owed to Brian, with this seemingly being the initial foothold that Jason has in the criminal web of Vice City.

It seems likely that Rockstar will allow players to stick up and rob stores throughout GTA 6 , but these kinds of shakedowns for Brian Heder should come with some distinct gameplay benefits that exist away from standard robbery. As the player helps Brian Heder expand his criminal enterprise through shakedowns of more clients across Vice City and beyond, territorial boosts could be given to increase control across GTA 6 's map.

Territory Control in GTA 6 Would Be a Logical Extension of the Franchise's Past

2004's San Andreas possesses one of the most famous examples of territory control in Grand Theft Auto 's past, with the player being able to systematically take over control of neighborhoods through gang warfare, increasing the overall presence of the Grove Street Families. While it seems that GTA 6 's story will not be as gang-centric as San Andreas , consistent shakedowns of areas could offer more subtle territory control while granting players a level of passive income that would need to be maintained.

Additionally, territory control could be used to directly weaken rival criminals in their own pursuit of expansion, with successful control then potentially opening up unique missions and interactions with Brian Heder and beyond. The confirmed game world of Grand Theft Auto 6 already seems massive, meaning Rockstar has a big task ahead of itself in terms of making this map feel alive and full of content, and a territory control system that offers narrative and mechanical benefits could be an excellent addition to the anticipated project.

item.title: Call of Duty: Black Ops 6 Player Discovers Major Issue With New Season 4 Weapon
item.description:
Summary

  • A Black Ops 6 player has discovered that the Essex Model 07 has a misaligned scope.
  • The Marksman Rifle was added to Black Ops 6 and Warzone with the shooter's Season 4 update last month.
  • This is not the first time that this issue has happened, as the Kar98k from Modern Warfare 3 still has a misaligned scope in Warzone.

An eagle-eyed Call of Duty: Black Ops 6 player has discovered that the scope on the new Essex Model 07, a Marksman Rifle that was added to the game with Season 4, is not centered. Although this might not seem like much of an issue, the misalignment of a weapon's scope can result in players missing their shots and potentially losing battles in Call of Duty: Black Ops 6 or Warzone , and it's not the first time this has happened either.

Call of Duty: Black Ops 6 's big Season 4 update launched on May 29, but the update has already caused multiple controversies. While players are now finding weapons with misaligned scopes, Call of Duty fans have already blasted the game's Season 4 update for a multitude of other reasons. Although the game's Season 3 update was heavily praised, Season 4 seems to have set the game back once again as it introduced stability issues, server lag, bugs, and more. Fans were also disappointed after Raven Software announced it would replace Battle Royale Solos from Call of Duty: Warzone in favor of Battle Royale Casual Solos, an identical game mode with one major difference: most of the players in the lobby are bots.

Black Ops 6's Essex Model 07's Scope Is Misaligned

It has been less than two weeks since Call of Duty: Black Ops 6 Season 4 launched, but players are already discovering a serious issue with the Essex Model 07. The new Marksman Rifle is available for free in the Season 4 Battle Pass, but Reddit user Professional_Read482 recently noticed that the weapon's scope is not centered. In a new post, the user said whenever they put a scope and a laser on the Essex Model 07, they don't match up. They say they checked with numerous other scopes, and the problem remains the same every single time. Other users, such as D34D0ne chimed in, saying that the gun is a "broken mess" as it also seems to have an issue that is preventing it from causing damage to enemies, even if a hitmarker appears.

Sadly, this isn't the first time this issue has happened in a Call of Duty game. After launching in 2023, Warzone players are still waiting for the Kar98k from Modern Warfare 3 to be fixed, as it has exactly the same issue as the Essex Model 07. The scope on the popular weapon has reportedly been misaligned in Warzone ever since it was released, but developer Raven Software has never deployed a fix for the issue. Two years later, fans are still attempting to bring attention to the problem. Given that it still remains an issue, there's a strong chance that the Essex Model 07 meets the same fate and remains broken forever.

While Black Ops 6 continues to receive new seasonal content updates, Treyarch Studios recently surprised fans by revealing Call of Duty: Black Ops 7 during the Xbox Games Showcase. The mind-bending teaser trailer closed the show and revealed that the next instalment in the franchise will be a direct sequel to Call of Duty: Black Ops 2 . Set in the year 2035, the world is ravaged by violent conflict and psychological warfare. Fan-favorites David Mason and the villainous Raul Menendez will make their return and continue the Black Ops story.
